text:
LiNote|France, OnSite, Full-Time

we built a device so simple people with Alzheimer's disease can receive video calls, pictures and reminders even without any former smartphone/tablet experience.

We are looking for a CTO. Our stack is Python, JS, Android, Postgres and Rabbitmq.

For more info visit our website: https://linote.fr To get in touch: anthony@linote.fr
